code: import React from"react";import ProductItem from"../ProductItem";import shoes from"../../shoedata";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductList=_ref=>{let{onAddToCart,cartItems}=_ref;const handleAddToCartClick=product=>{onAddToCart(product);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/image/nike.png",alt:"#"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-title",children:"Our Products"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-body",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:shoes.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductItem,{data:product,color:product.color,onAddToCart:handleAddToCartClick,isInCart:cartItems.some(item=>item.id===product.id)},product.id))})})]});};export default ProductList;
